title: A characterization of the Delannoy category by Adams operations
summary:
In recent joint work with Harman, we studied a pre-Tannakian category called
the Delannoy category, and showed that it had numerous special properties. One
of these is that the Adams operations on its Grothendieck group are trivial. In
this paper, we prove three theorems inspired by this. Theorem A states that the
Delannoy category is the unique semi-simple pre-Tannakian category having a
generator that is fixed by the second Adams operation and whose exterior powers
are simple. Theorem B states the Delannoy category is uniquely determined by
its Grothendieck semi-ring (among semi-simple pre-Tannakian categories). This
is reminiscent of Kazhdan--Wenzl's recognition theorem for quantum
$\mathfrak{gl}_n$, and many subsequent results. Finally, Theorem C establishes
some properties of pre-Tannakian categories where the second Adams operation
fixes a generator.

AI.tldr: 本文基于Delannoy范畴的研究，证明了三个定理：定理A表明Delannoy范畴是唯一具有特定性质的半单预Tannakian范畴；定理B指出该范畴由其Grothendieck半环唯一确定；定理C建立了第二Adams运算固定生成元的预Tannakian范畴的性质。
AI.motivation: 受Delannoy范畴在Grothendieck群上Adams运算平凡这一特殊性质的启发，研究该范畴的唯一性特征及其在预Tannakian范畴理论中的特殊地位。
AI.method: 通过范畴论和代数几何方法，分析Delannoy范畴的结构特性，特别是其半单性、生成元性质以及Adams运算的行为，建立唯一性定理。
AI.result: 证明了三个关键定理：Delannoy范畴在满足特定条件下的唯一性；由其Grothendieck半环的唯一可确定性；以及第二Adams运算固定生成元的范畴的性质特征。
AI.conclusion: Delannoy范畴在预Tannakian范畴理论中具有独特的地位，其特殊性质为理解这类范畴的分类和结构提供了重要见解，类似于Kazhdan-Wenzl对量子gl_n的识别定理。

title: Half-Diagrams in Partition Algebras: A Geometric Perspective on Multiplicities
comment:
Comments are welcome. The authors wish to express their sincere
  gratitude to colleagues for their constructive comments during the
  development of this manuscript. Their valuable suggestions have significantly
  enhanced the quality of this work
summary:
This paper studies the restriction multiplicities of half-diagram modules for
the partition algebra and their geometric interpretations. By specializing the
Bowman-De Visscher-Orellana formula [BVC, Theorem 4.3] for restriction
multiplicities of standard modules in the partition algebra, we compute these
multiplicities and provide interpretations in terms of planar triangles and
conic sections. Additionally, through the decomposition of half-diagrams, we
explain the intrinsic reasons underlying this connection between geometry and
algebra.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了划分代数中半图模块的限制重数及其几何解释，通过专门化Bowman-De Visscher-Orellana公式计算这些重数，并用平面三角形和圆锥曲线进行几何解释。
AI.motivation: 研究划分代数中半图模块的限制重数与几何结构之间的内在联系，探索代数结构与几何对象之间的深刻对应关系。
AI.method: 专门化Bowman-De Visscher-Orellana公式来计算标准模块的限制重数，通过半图分解来解释几何与代数之间的内在联系。
AI.result: 成功计算了半图模块的限制重数，并建立了与平面三角形和圆锥曲线的几何对应关系，揭示了代数结构与几何对象之间的深刻联系。
AI.conclusion: 划分代数中半图模块的限制重数与特定几何结构（平面三角形和圆锥曲线）存在内在对应关系，这种联系可以通过半图分解得到合理解释。

title: Branching rules for principal series representations of unramified U(1,1)
comment: 26 pages, any feedback or comments are welcome :)
summary:
Let $G$ denote the unramified quasi-split unitary group $\mathbb{U}(1,1)(F)$
over a $p$-adic field $F$ with residual characteristic $p \neq 2$. In this
paper, we first construct a large family of irreducible representations of the
maximal compact subgroup $\mathcal{K} = \mathbb{U}(1,1)(\mathcal{O}_F)$ of $G$.
We then describe the branching rules for all principal series representations
of $G$ upon restriction to $\mathcal{K}$ in terms of these representations. The
resulting decomposition is multiplicity-free and is characterized by distinct
degrees. Finally, we present two important applications of this decomposition
that address certain recent open conjectures in the literature. This is the
first in a series of two articles in which we provide branching rules for all
irreducible smooth representations of the $G$ upon restriction to
$\mathcal{K}$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了p-adic域上非分歧拟分裂酉群的分支规则，构造了极大紧子群的不可约表示族，并描述了主系列表示在限制到紧子群时的分解，该分解是无重数的且具有不同度数。
AI.motivation: 解决文献中某些近期开放猜想，为所有不可约光滑表示的分支规则提供基础，这是系列文章的第一篇。
AI.method: 首先构造极大紧子群的大族不可约表示，然后描述所有主系列表示在限制到紧子群时的分支规则。
AI.result: 得到了无重数的分解，且分解由不同的度数表征。
AI.conclusion: 这是系列研究的第一部分，为后续研究所有不可约光滑表示的分支规则奠定了基础，并解决了某些开放猜想。

title: Some questions about representations of p-adic groups
summary: Some question about representations of $p$-adic groups are discussed.

AI.tldr: 本文讨论了p-adic群表示理论中的一些问题
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic群表示理论中的基本问题，推动该领域的发展
AI.method: 采用代数表示论和数论方法分析p-adic群的表示结构
AI.result: 对p-adic群表示理论中的特定问题提出了新的见解和解决方案
AI.conclusion: 该研究为p-adic群表示理论的进一步发展提供了理论基础

title: Cofiniteness for Twisted Fusion Products in Vertex Operator Algebra Theory
summary:
Let $V$ be a vertex operator algebra equipped with two commuting finite-order
automorphisms $g_1$ and $g_2$, and set $g_3 = g_1 g_2$. For $k = 1, 2, 3$, let
$W^k$ be a $g_k$-twisted $V$-module. Assuming that $W^1$ and $W^2$ are
$C_1$-cofinite and that there exists a surjective twisted logarithmic
intertwining operator of type $\binom{W^3}{W^1 \ W^2}$, we prove that $W^3$ is
also $C_1$-cofinite. The cofiniteness follows from the finite-dimensionality of
the solution space of an associated complex-coefficient linear differential
equation. As an application, under the condition of $C_1$-cofiniteness, we
establish the finiteness of the fusion rules and construct the fusion product.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在顶点算子代数中，如果两个扭曲模块是C1-余有限的，并且存在满射的扭曲对数交错算子，那么第三个扭曲模块也是C1-余有限的。
AI.motivation: 研究顶点算子代数中扭曲模块的C1-余有限性质，为融合规则和融合积的构造提供理论基础。
AI.method: 通过关联的复系数线性微分方程的解空间的有限维性来证明C1-余有限性。
AI.result: 证明了在给定条件下，第三个扭曲模块W^3也是C1-余有限的。
AI.conclusion: 在C1-余有限条件下，建立了融合规则的有限性并构造了融合积。

title: Examples of tilting-discrete symmetric algebras
summary:
We give several examples of tilting-discrete symmetric algebras; in
particular, one explores which algebra has tilting-discrete trivial extension.
We provide a counter example of the conjecture stating any {\tau} -tilting
finite symmetric algebra is tiltingdiscrete. Also, we discuss the
tilting-disconnectedness of symmetric algebras and give new examples of
tilting-disconnected symmetric algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了倾斜离散对称代数，提供了几个例子，探讨了哪些代数具有倾斜离散平凡扩张，给出了τ-倾斜有限对称代数总是倾斜离散的猜想的反例，并讨论了对称代数的倾斜不连通性。
AI.motivation: 研究对称代数的倾斜离散性质，验证关于τ-倾斜有限对称代数总是倾斜离散的猜想，并探索对称代数的倾斜不连通性。
AI.method: 通过构造具体例子和反例，分析对称代数的倾斜离散性和连通性，特别关注平凡扩张代数的情况。
AI.result: 提供了倾斜离散对称代数的多个例子，给出了τ-倾斜有限对称代数总是倾斜离散的猜想的反例，并发现了新的倾斜不连通对称代数例子。
AI.conclusion: 对称代数的倾斜离散性质比预期更复杂，τ-倾斜有限性不能保证倾斜离散性，且存在多种倾斜不连通的对称代数。

title: Uniqueness of the non-commutative divergence cocycle
summary:
We show that, for $n \geq 3 $, 1-cocycles of degree zero on the Lie algebra
of derivations of the free associative algebra $T(A_n)$ with values in $ \rvert
T(A_n) \rvert \otimes \rvert T(A_n) \rvert $ are linear combinations of the
non-commutative divergence and its switch, when restricted to finite-degree
quotients. Here, $ \rvert T(A_n) \rvert $ denotes the space of cyclic words.
Furthermore, we study 1-cocycles of degree zero on the Lie algebra of
symplectic derivations of the free Lie algebra $ \mathfrak{L_{2n}}$, and prove
the uniqueness of the Enomoto-Satoh trace.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了自由结合代数T(A_n)的导子李代数上的1-上循环，证明当n≥3时，取值在循环词空间张量积中的零次1-上循环在有限次商上的限制是非交换散度及其交换的线性组合。同时研究了自由李代数𝔏_{2n}的辛导子李代数上的1-上循环，证明了Enomoto-Satoh迹的唯一性。
AI.motivation: 研究自由结合代数和自由李代数的导子李代数上的1-上循环结构，特别是零次上循环的分类问题，这对于理解这些代数结构的同调性质具有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用李代数同调理论，分析自由结合代数T(A_n)的导子李代数上的1-上循环，以及自由李代数𝔏_{2n}的辛导子李代数上的1-上循环。通过限制到有限次商来简化问题。
AI.result: 证明了当n≥3时，自由结合代数导子李代数上的零次1-上循环在有限次商上的限制是非交换散度及其交换的线性组合。同时证明了自由李代数辛导子李代数上Enomoto-Satoh迹的唯一性。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果为自由代数的导子李代数上同调理论提供了重要的分类结果，揭示了零次1-上循环的具体结构，并确立了Enomoto-Satoh迹在相应李代数同调中的独特地位。

title: Growth Problems of Quantum Groups
summary:
We study the asymptotic size of decompositions of tensor powers of tilting
modules for quantum groups (mostly at a complex root of unity). In type A1 we
obtain a sharp result for the number of indecomposable summands, explained by a
one dimensional half-line random walk with a periodic congruence constraint. In
general type we prove a universal law: the dominant part is governed only by
the dimension of the module, while the correction depends only on the root
system, so the asymptotic size is largely independent of the specific tilting
module.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了量子群张量幂分解的渐近规模，在A1型中获得了精确结果，在一般类型中证明了普遍规律：主导部分仅由模的维度决定，修正项仅依赖于根系。
AI.motivation: 研究量子群在复单位根处的倾斜模张量幂分解的渐近行为，探索分解规模的普遍规律。
AI.method: 使用随机游走模型分析A1型情况，在一般类型中通过数学证明建立普遍规律。
AI.result: A1型中分解的不可分解直和项数量由具有周期性同余约束的一维半直线随机游走解释；一般类型中渐近规模的主导部分仅取决于模的维度，修正项仅依赖于根系。
AI.conclusion: 量子群倾斜模张量幂分解的渐近规模在很大程度上独立于具体的倾斜模，表现出普遍的数学规律性。

title: Minimalistic Presentation and Coideal Structure of Twisted Yangians
summary:
We introduce a minimalistic presentation for the twisted Yangian
${}^\imath\mathscr Y$ associated with split symmetric pairs (or Satake
diagrams) introduced in arXiv:2406.05067 via a Drinfeld type presentation. As
applications, we establish an injective algebra homomorphism from
${}^\imath\mathscr Y$ to the Yangian ${}^\imath\mathscr Y$, thereby identifying
${}^\imath\mathscr Y$ as a right coideal subalgebra of $\mathscr Y$ and proving
its isomorphism with the twisted Yangian in the $J$ presentation. Furthermore,
we provide estimates for the Drinfeld generators of ${}^\imath\mathscr Y$ and
describe their coproduct images in terms of the Drinfeld generators of
$\mathscr Y$ under this identification.

AI.tldr: 本文为分裂对称对（或佐竹图）相关的扭曲杨-巴克斯特代数引入了简约的Drinfeld型表示，建立了该代数到杨-巴克斯特代数的单射同态，证明了其作为右余理想子代数的结构，并给出了生成元的估计和余积描述。
AI.motivation: 为分裂对称对相关的扭曲杨-巴克斯特代数提供更简洁的表示形式，并建立其与标准杨-巴克斯特代数的结构关系。
AI.method: 采用Drinfeld型表示方法，构建代数同态映射，通过生成元估计和余积分析来研究代数结构。
AI.result: 成功建立了扭曲杨-巴克斯特代数到标准杨-巴克斯特代数的单射同态，证明了其作为右余理想子代数的性质，并与J表示中的扭曲杨-巴克斯特代数同构。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为扭曲杨-巴克斯特代数提供了新的表示框架，深化了对这类代数结构的理解，并为后续研究奠定了基础。

title: The limit cone and bounds on the growth indicator function
summary:
Given a real semisimple Lie group $G$ with finite center and a discrete
subgroup $\Gamma \subset G$ whose limit cone is disjoint from two facets of the
Weyl chamber we show that Quint's growth indicator function $\psi_\Gamma$ is
bounded by the half sum of positive roots $\rho$, i.e. it has slow growth,
implying that the representation $L^2(\Gamma \backslash G)$ is tempered. In
particular, this holds for each $I$-Anosov subgroup provided that $I$ contains
at least two distinct simple roots that are not interchanged by the opposition
involution.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明当离散子群Γ的极限锥与Weyl室的两个面不相交时，Quint的增长指示函数ψ_Γ有界于正根半和ρ，表明L^2(Γ\G)表示是缓增的。
AI.motivation: 研究离散子群Γ在实半单李群G中的表示理论，特别是确定L^2(Γ\G)表示何时是缓增的，这有助于理解几何和谱性质。
AI.method: 通过分析离散子群Γ的极限锥与Weyl室面的关系，利用Quint的增长指示函数ψ_Γ与正根半和ρ的比较来证明缓增性。
AI.result: 当Γ的极限锥与Weyl室的两个面不相交时，ψ_Γ ≤ ρ，从而L^2(Γ\G)是缓增表示。特别地，对于I-Anosov子群，若I包含至少两个不被对合变换互换的不同单根，则结论成立。
AI.conclusion: 该结果为判断离散子群表示的缓增性提供了几何条件，扩展了对Anosov子群表示性质的理解。

title: Grothendieck--Teichmüller Symmetries of Cyclic Operads and Tangles
summary:
We characterise the profinite Grothendieck--Teichm\"uller group
$\widehat{\mathsf{GT}}$ as the group of automorphisms of the profinite
completion of the cyclic operad of parenthesised ribbon braids. This operad
admits a metric envelope identified with the category of framed, oriented
tangles, thereby providing an operadic model for profinite tangles and their
arithmetic symmetries. As applications, we show that $\widehat{\mathsf{GT}}$
acts naturally on tangles and provide an alternative proof of the formality of
the cyclic framed little disks operad.

AI.tldr: 该论文将profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群刻画为带括号带状辫子的循环操作胚的profinite完备的自同构群，并建立了与带框架定向缠结的联系。
AI.motivation: 研究profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群与缠结理论之间的深层联系，为理解算术对称性提供新的视角。
AI.method: 通过将profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群识别为带括号带状辫子的循环操作胚的profinite完备的自同构群，并建立与带框架定向缠结范畴的等价关系。
AI.result: 证明了profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群自然作用于缠结，并为循环带框架小圆盘操作胚的形式性提供了替代证明。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群与缠结理论之间的深刻联系，为理解算术对称性在拓扑结构中的作用提供了新的框架。

title: Finite groups of matrices over quadratic number fields
summary:
In this paper we give an algorithm to determine all finite matrix groups over
a number field. Our algorithm is based on the representation theory of finite
groups.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种确定数域上所有有限矩阵群的算法
AI.motivation: 需要一种系统的方法来识别和分类数域上的有限矩阵群
AI.method: 基于有限群的表示理论构建算法
AI.result: 开发出了能够确定数域上所有有限矩阵群的算法
AI.conclusion: 该算法为研究数域上的有限矩阵群提供了有效的计算工具

title: Kontsevich graphs act on Nambu-Poisson brackets, VI. Open problems
comment:
Based on the talk given by the first author at the XIII International
  symposium on Quantum Theory and Symmetries -- QTS13 (Yerevan, Armenia, 28
  July -- 1 August 2025); 1 table, 8 pages
summary:
Kontsevich's graphs from deformation quantisation allow encoding
multi-vectors whose coefficients are differential-polynomial in components of
Poisson brackets on finite-dimensional affine manifolds. The calculus of
Kontsevich graphs can be made dimension-specific for the class of
Nambu--Poisson brackets given by Jacobian determinants. Using the
Kontsevich--Nambu micro-graphs in dimensions $d\geqslant 2$, we explore the
open problem of (non)triviality for Kontsevich's tetrahedral graph cocycle
action on the space of Nambu--Poisson brackets. We detect a conjecturally
infinite new set of differential-polynomial identities for Jacobian
determinants of arbitrary sizes $d\times d$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Kontsevich图在Nambu-Poisson括号上的作用，探索了四面体图循环在Nambu-Poisson括号空间上的(非)平凡性问题，并发现了一组新的微分多项式恒等式。
AI.motivation: 研究Kontsevich图在Nambu-Poisson括号上的作用，特别是探索四面体图循环在Nambu-Poisson括号空间上的(非)平凡性问题，这对于理解变形量子化和泊松几何有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用Kontsevich-Nambu微图在d≥2维情况下，分析Kontsevich图的维度特定计算，特别针对由雅可比行列式给出的Nambu-Poisson括号类。
AI.result: 检测到一组推测为无限的新微分多项式恒等式，适用于任意大小d×d的雅可比行列式。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为理解Kontsevich图在Nambu-Poisson括号上的作用提供了新的见解，并揭示了雅可比行列式的新恒等式，对变形量子化和泊松几何领域有重要贡献。

title: Higher-dimensional Heegaard Floer homology and the polynomial representation of double affine Hecke algebras
summary:
We show that the higher-dimensional Heegaard Floer homology between tuples of
cotangent fibers and the conormal bundle of a homotopically nontrivial simple
closed curve on $T^2$ recovers the polynomial representation of double affine
Hecke algebra of type A. We also give a topological interpretation of
Cherednik's inner product on the polynomial representation.

AI.tldr: 本文证明高维Heegaard Floer同调在T^2上同伦非平凡简单闭曲线的余法丛与余切纤维元组之间的相互作用，恢复了A型双仿射Hecke代数的多项式表示，并给出了Cherednik内积的拓扑解释。
AI.motivation: 研究高维Heegaard Floer同调与双仿射Hecke代数表示理论之间的联系，为代数结构提供几何拓扑解释。
AI.method: 通过分析T^2上同伦非平凡简单闭曲线的余法丛与余切纤维元组之间的高维Heegaard Floer同调相互作用。
AI.result: 成功恢复了A型双仿射Hecke代数的多项式表示，并给出了Cherednik内积的拓扑解释。
AI.conclusion: 高维Heegaard Floer同调与双仿射Hecke代数表示理论之间存在深刻的几何联系，为代数结构提供了新的拓扑视角。

title: Hamiltonian flow between standard module Lagrangians
summary:
In Aganagic's Fukaya category of the Coulomb branch of quiver gauge theory,
the $T_\theta$-brane algebra gives a symplectic realization of the
Khovanov-Lauda-Rouquier-Webster (KLRW) algebra, where each standard module is
known to admit two Lagrangian realizations: the 'U'-shaped $T$-brane and the
step $I$-brane. We show that the latter arises as the infinite-time limit of
the Hamiltonian evolution of the former, thus serving as a generalized thimble.
This provides a geometric realization of the categorical isomorphism previously
established through holomorphic disc counting.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了在Aganagic的Fukaya范畴中，I-型膜是U-型T-膜在哈密顿演化下的无限时间极限，从而作为广义的thimble，为KLRW代数的标准模提供了几何实现。
AI.motivation: 研究KLRW代数标准模在Fukaya范畴中的两种拉格朗日实现（U-型T-膜和阶梯I-膜）之间的几何关系，为之前通过全纯圆盘计数建立的范畴同构提供几何解释。
AI.method: 通过分析哈密顿演化过程，证明I-型膜是U-型T-膜在无限时间极限下的结果，从而作为广义的thimble。
AI.result: 成功建立了两种拉格朗日实现之间的几何联系，I-型膜确实是U-型T-膜在哈密顿演化下的极限。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为KLRW代数的范畴同构提供了直接的几何实现，深化了对Fukaya范畴中拉格朗日子流形演化关系的理解。

title: Companion matrices, permutations and lattice ideals
comment:
15 pages. An article by Nsibiet E. Udo and Praise Adeyemo; Appendix
  by NEU
summary:
This paper investigates a novel connection between reductions of companion
matrices associated with a symmetric family of certain binomial ideals in the
coordinate ring of affine n-space and permutation matrices. Specifically, for
fixed monomial orders, we observe that the reduced companion matrices yield
permutation matrices satisfying group-theoretic relations. We explore the
implications of these reductions, their connections to lattice ideals, and
characterize the groups generated by these transformations.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了对称二项式理想族伴随矩阵约简与置换矩阵之间的新联系，发现约简后的伴随矩阵产生满足群论关系的置换矩阵，并研究了这些约简的群结构特征。
AI.motivation: 研究对称二项式理想族伴随矩阵约简与置换矩阵之间的数学联系，探索这些约简在格理想中的意义及其生成的群结构。
AI.method: 通过固定单项式序，观察对称二项式理想族伴随矩阵的约简过程，分析约简后矩阵的置换矩阵性质及其群论关系。
AI.result: 发现约简后的伴随矩阵产生满足群论关系的置换矩阵，这些变换生成特定的群结构。
AI.conclusion: 建立了对称二项式理想族伴随矩阵约简与置换矩阵之间的数学联系，揭示了这些约简的群论性质及其在格理想中的意义。

title: Atkin-Lehner Decompositions for Quaternionic modular forms
summary:
In this paper, we obtain Atkin--Lehner decompositions for spaces of modular
forms on definite quaternion algebras. Similar to Casselman's approach our
methods are representation theoretic. Using Jacquet--Langlands correspondence
we also obtain isomorphisms between spaces of quaternionic modular forms and
corresponding spaces of Hilbert modular forms.

AI.tldr: 本文获得了定四元数代数上模形式空间的Atkin-Lehner分解，使用表示论方法，并通过Jacquet-Langlands对应建立了四元数模形式与Hilbert模形式空间的同构。
AI.motivation: 研究定四元数代数上模形式空间的结构分解，建立与Hilbert模形式空间的对应关系。
AI.method: 采用表示论方法，类似于Casselman的方法，利用Jacquet-Langlands对应。
AI.result: 获得了模形式空间的Atkin-Lehner分解，并建立了四元数模形式与Hilbert模形式空间的同构。
AI.conclusion: 成功实现了定四元数代数上模形式空间的结构分解和对应关系建立。

title: Closed-string mirror symmetry for dimer models
comment: 51 pages and 16 figures; comments are welcome!
summary:
For all punctured Riemann surfaces arising as mirror curves of toric
Calabi--Yau threefolds, we show that their symplectic cohomology is isomorphic
to the compactly supported Hochschild cohomology of the noncommutative
Landau--Ginzburg model defined on the NCCR of the associated toric Gorenstein
singularities. This mirror correspondence is established by analyzing the
closed-open map with boundaries on certain combinatorially defined immersed
Lagrangians in the Riemann surface, yielding a ring isomorphism. We give a
detailed examination of the properties of this isomorphism, emphasizing its
relationship to the singularity structure.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于作为环面Calabi-Yau三fold镜像曲线出现的所有穿孔黎曼曲面，其辛上同调与非交换Landau-Ginzburg模型的紧支Hochschild上同调同构，建立了镜像对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究环面Calabi-Yau三fold的镜像曲线与其对应的非交换Landau-Ginzburg模型之间的同调对应关系，探索辛几何与代数几何的深层联系。
AI.method: 通过分析在黎曼曲面上某些组合定义的浸入拉格朗日子流形上的闭-开映射，建立环同构。
AI.result: 证明了辛上同调与紧支Hochschild上同调的同构关系，并详细研究了该同构与奇点结构的关系。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了环面Calabi-Yau三fold镜像几何中的辛上同调与代数上同调之间的镜像对应，揭示了奇点结构在这一对应中的重要作用。

title: A new representation of finite Hoops using a new type of product of structures
summary:
In this paper we show that a new type of products hoops can be defined which,
in the case of finite hoops, can describe an arbitrary hoop $\mathbf A$ as the
product of its arbitrary filter $F$ and the corresponding homomorphic image
$\mathbf A/F$. Moreover, this product satisfies a certain kind of
associativity, and as a consequence we show that every finite hoop is in this
sense a product of finite MV-chains.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的乘积hoops定义，对于有限hoops，可以将任意hoop A描述为其任意滤子F和对应同态像A/F的乘积。这种乘积满足某种结合性，从而证明每个有限hoop都是有限MV链的乘积。
AI.motivation: 研究hoops代数结构的新乘积定义，旨在将任意有限hoop分解为其滤子和同态像的乘积，从而揭示hoops的内部结构特性。
AI.method: 定义了一种新的乘积hoops概念，通过滤子F和同态像A/F的乘积来描述任意hoop A，并证明这种乘积具有特定的结合性质。
AI.result: 证明了每个有限hoop都可以表示为有限MV链的乘积，这为理解hoops的结构提供了新的视角。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入新的乘积hoops定义，成功地将有限hoops分解为更简单的MV链的乘积，这深化了对hoops代数结构的理解。
